body: I got strange results on UTCI for the file attached, using Singapore's EPW file During midnight of 1-Aug, the UTCI of outdoor space are almost 30+ degrees, which are even higher than some of the daytime results such as 14pm: Appreciate if you can advise if this is reasonable! Thank you! topic: microclimate map - strange UTCI results for midnight
